Package it.brujo.json

package it.brujo.json
Classes are structed as follow:
        { 
                JSonLabel : JSonElem,
                JSonLabel : JSonElem,   
                JSonLabel : JSonElem
        }
or 
 [ JSonElem, JSonElem, JSonElem, JSonElem ]
Class hierarchy is as follow: 
  JSonElem ---+--- JSonArray 
              |
              +--- JSonObj 
              |
              +--- JSonValue ----- JSonConstant
                               |
                               +-- JSonNumber
                               |
                               +-- JSonString
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    JSonArray
    The class for a JSON array
    JSonBuilder
     
    JSonConst
    This class is not instantiable.
    JSonElem
    The base class for each JSON element
    JSonExplorer
     
    JSonFormatter
    Trasform an internal rapresentation to a JSON text.
    JSonFormatter.FormatBuilder
    The configuration utility for the Formatter
    JSonLabel
    This class is a wrapper for the String that is used as name in JSON objects name:value pairs.
    JSonNumber
    This class represents a JSON numeric value
    JSonObj
    The class for a JSON object
    JSonParser
    The class for JSON parsing
    JSonPath
    A class to query map all the JSON value in a hierarchical map.
    JSonPath.MapBuilder
    the configuration class
    JSonString
    It rapresents a String value
    JSonValue
    Base class for a basic values (Number,String,true,false or null)
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    JSonParser.JSonParseEx
    This exception is thrown both in case of syntax problems and internal errors.
